CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.12a, drugstartdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.4.k.12a, drugstartdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.4 Date and Time of Start of Drug Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.label: Start of Drug
